message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $105 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $110.
